section.title: Reviewing the changes in the files before a commit
See the differences in the working tree since the last commit
section.para: The git diff command allows seeing the changes in the working tree compared to the last commit.

section.title: Example: Using "git diff" to see the file changes in the working tree
section.para: In order to test this, make some changes to a file and check what the git diff command shows to you. Afterwards commit the changes to the repository.
